website_summaries.verdict: Experience walking on clouds with this pair of walking trainers. It is built using light materials that won’t drag your foot down, no matter how far you’ve traveled. The cushioning unit has a high-rebound property that prevents tired, achy feet.Meanwhile, getting ready to go out is literally as easy as stepping inside this pair of walking shoes. No laces to fuss with, plus it’s quite stylish. It checks the tickboxes for both style and functionality.
pros: The Skechers GOwalk - Apprize is so comfortable that a lot of the owners bought multiple pairs
A high number of elderlies rave about how easy it is to put on and remove
Another thing a lot of people loved about this pair of Skechers walking shoes is that it can be machine-washed
Numerous shoppers like the casual look of this footwear
The breathable top keeps the feet fresh, says many reviewers
Walking long distances is not a problem for plenty of wearers because the shoe doesn’t weigh much
cons: A couple of individuals wish for more cushioning under the forefoot area

customer_reviews.title: Super comfort !
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Skechers shoes I have bought. They are well made and casual/stylish, albeit that they are somewhat expensive for this type of shoe. Whilst I note that they are manufactured in Taiwan, the design has a European style so I assume they are designed somewhere in Europe.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Fox

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. so comfy. I know they are more pricey than some, but at least they will last and give great comfort. At the moment they are the only brand I will buy.
customer_reviews.author: LynnS

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, albeit a little expensive
customer_reviews.text: Big fan of Sketchers, but normally put off by the price. I use these as a comfortable set of indoor slippers. Expensive for what they are though.
customer_reviews.author: Ian King

customer_reviews.title: Skechers.
customer_reviews.text: Great comfortable fit and good quality. Highly delighted with them and the quick delivery time.
customer_reviews.author: ralph yardley

customer_reviews.title: Reliable quality
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased Sketchers leisure shoes for years for their comfort and quality. These are no exception.
customer_reviews.author: Xet

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I normally take a wider fitting but these fit perfectly, got as replacement for slippers around the house due to a dodgy foot and so far ideal.
customer_reviews.author: A. Pickering

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: They are the best trainers I have ever had, fit like a glove and so comfortable
customer_reviews.author: larry kilby

customer_reviews.title: Style and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Value for money 2nd pair i have bought no complaints
customer_reviews.author: peter davis

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy this item as I bought it for my hubby a size 6.5 and he says it’s soooo uncomfortable 😣 so we’re not happy at all and I keep messaging the seller but they say it’s not one of their items even thou I provide the order number and everything else but nope...
customer_reviews.author: Hanifah Kakar

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Was a nice light pair of slippers for my husband
customer_reviews.author: pan

customer_reviews.title: Great shoe highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd pair of Skechers go walk Most comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have had these shoes before, they are light and very comfy.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Theakston

customer_reviews.title: Shoes were too large
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were to big , but I had to pay £5 to return them via post office which really upset me
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product but colour is not as advertised which is disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Lovely fit and very comfortable, however, they are blue and grey - not blue and white as advertised- this is disappointing
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfy. Suitable for prolonged activities on foot in dry conditions.
customer_reviews.author: A. Inyutin

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but very little support. Elasticated Material used doesn’t stay tight for long. They are like comfy slippers so not great to walk distances in.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t fit me, returned. Very good return procedure.
customer_reviews.text: I have narrow heels and wider at the toe box area. I ordered my usual size of UK 10.5. They nearly fitted. Length was good but they were too wide and spacious at the heel. The comfort was nice - just what you expect from Skechers. However, although I didn’t have them on for long (the fit was so off I knew immediately they wouldn’t do) one thing I found was that they immediately felt very warm. Even if they had fitted I’m not sure I could have put up with that. The returns process was painless and free. Full marks on that.
customer_reviews.author: Stoob

customer_reviews.title: Really Really comfortable shoes for walking!
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable shoe and fit for any purpose - short walk, long walk and like a slip on also ! Of course not made for run/jog and it is a perfect pair if you have heel pain, knee pain and want a soft sole and nice fit pair of shoes! Also got it cheaper on Amazon than the store!!!
customer_reviews.author: AK

customer_reviews.title: Men’s Sketchers
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these again for my son in law this is his third pair he loves the comfort style and make good price colour and fit good price another Xmas present solved
customer_reviews.author: MAYO380

customer_reviews.title: Best of the best
customer_reviews.text: They were the closest to my old Go Walk 3 ( worn nearly daily lasted 3 years) and just as comfortable. Just like slippers 👍
customer_reviews.author: Don Warrington

customer_reviews.title: Came on time
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say, nice, comfortable, fits well, came on time, no dramas at all, will buy again(when I get more cash flow 😁) 5 *****
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Another good Sketchers product
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair of GoWalk. I wear them indoors instead of slippers - so much better for foot support. Latest GoWalk 5 design is smarter than my previous GoWalk 3 and fit just as well. I’m usually a size 10 for trainers and these size 10’s slip on with a good fit/grip.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Hornet

customer_reviews.title: No complaints at all
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic in every way so comfortable always been a big fan and I’ve worn them for years
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Size matching
customer_reviews.text: The normal size that i would have opted for as in shoes & trainers etc are too large for me in these Sadly the tags were removed so i dont think option of exchange is still available
customer_reviews.author: Jerrers

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size.
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoes, but not true to size.Very baggy around the upper foot and ankle.
customer_reviews.author: ayesha1

customer_reviews.title: they look very good on
customer_reviews.text: shoes are so comfortable and also very light to wear. Antony
customer_reviews.author: antony hodson

customer_reviews.title: very badly made
customer_reviews.text: excess glue inside and out. bad stitching. They are supposed to be air cooled but make feet very hot. not the sketchers I had enjoyed wearing. Stevie Wonder would make a better pair. I will not be buying them anymore which is a shame as they used to be so good. what has happened? outsourcing.
customer_reviews.author: joseph

product_meta.title: Skechers Men's Go Walk 5 Apprize Slip On Trainers
product_meta.description: The leaders in walking shoe technology continue to innovative with the Skechers GO Walk 5™ - apprize. Features lightweight, responsive ultra go™ cushioning and high-rebound comfort pillar technology; for the ultimate in walking comfort. Soft.
